personal.name: Said Mustafa
personal.title: AI & ML Specialist | DevOps Engineer
personal.bio: AI and Cloud ML Specialist with 2+ years of experience developing secure, scalable cloud solutions. Skilled in optimizing machine learning workflows and deploying models efficiently on cloud platforms.

experience.title: Cloud Machine Learning Specialist
experience.description: Architected and managed AWS infrastructure for high-performance AI applications with 99.9% uptime. Developed and deployed ML models using MLflow, fine-tuned LLMs, implemented RAG systems, built intelligent agent-based systems, and automated data processing pipelines.

experience.title: Intern Penetration Tester
experience.description: Conducted penetration testing and security audits using Burp Suite and Metasploit. Automated security tasks with Python and Bash, and presented complex security concepts to non-technical stakeholders.

experience.title: Freelance Script Writer
experience.description: Developed automation scripts for Linux systems, applied web scraping techniques with BeautifulSoup and Scrapy, and created an AI-integrated trading bot using Python and TensorFlow.

blogPosts.title: Understanding LLMs
blogPosts.excerpt: A deep dive into how Large Language Models work and their applications in modern AI solutions.
